entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -3.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Bay Airport 08:44 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 94 %

entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending late this morning then cloudy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late this morning. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 07:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 07:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
